testcase.name: SIGNUP: User should get an error if fields are empty
SIGNUP: User should get an error if username is less than 3 characters
SIGNUP: User should get an error if username is greater than 18 characters
SIGNUP: User should get an error if username is not alphanumeric
SIGNUP: User should get an error if email is invalid
SIGNUP: User should get an error if password is less than 6 characters
SIGNUP: User should get an error if passwords do not match
SIGNUP: User should be able to create a new account with correct details
SIGNUP: User should get an error message if username has been taken
SIGNUP: User should get an error message if email has been taken
SIGNUP: should signup a new user with different email and unsername
